text:
I visited PPE Distribution yesterday, to buy safety boots as I was eyeing one and they had it. The place was clean and was greeted by almost everyone. I was attended by James, a young and friendly chap. The overall experience was great, good value for money and got a free gift.

I really recommend this place to everyone if you’re getting your safety gears.

Their unit is located on the 3rd floor of Block 9004. Take the lift and turn right and right again to reach the unit, you wouldn’t miss it when you take the right as there’ll be a signboard at the very end.

Thank you very much PPE Distribution for the warm welcome and assistance.

Very satisfied with their service.
Sadly can't say the same for the catapillar boot that I had brought from them. Can't believe how far the catapillar has fallen in their quality... Luckily the salesman and women are very understanding and exchanged another boot model with no question.

I’ve been purchasing individual quantities of personal protective gear for more then 8 years, am very happy that they serve you with care and sincerity, giving professional advice when enquired, even for a pair of gloves or safety goggles. Good selection of  Professional quality gear for various reasonable budgets. The half-face masks and high db earmuffs I bought from them are still serving me well, it’s been 6years. I’ve recommended friends from various industries to them and all were satisfied.

The retail space is clean and tidy, even though it’s quite small. Items are displayed very clearly and has a good range of safety shoes. The staff were friendly and helpful and were more than willing to entertained a fussy customer like me. Will most definitely visit again.
Bought a couple of ear muffs, the people there are friendly and they have a good range of products to choose from. Great fuss free experience
